Desc.entry: Interdenominational Christian church for people with learning disabilities, comprehension difficulties and everyone else who enjoys an interactive experience of God, and their friends aged 12 years and over. Partnership between Compassionate Response and Meadowhead Christian Fellowship.

ContactName.entry: Rev David Middleton, Minister/Capt Keith Blinston (Church Army), Assistant Minister

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Alternate Sun at 7pm (service followed by social)

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
